name: rea-playspace
description: A visual node-and-edge playspace for exploring Valueflows and REA accounting

scripts.install-deps: pnpm run tests-install && pnpm run web-install
scripts.hc:redo: pnpm run hc:reset && pnpm run happ-run
scripts.hc:run: sh -c 'set -o allexport; . environments/.env; set +o allexport; . scripts/happ-run.sh'
scripts.hc:run2: sh -c 'set -o allexport; . environments/.env.dev2; set +o allexport; . scripts/happ-run.sh'
scripts.playground: sh -c 'set -o allexport; . environments/.env; set +o allexport; npx @holochain-playground/cli ws://localhost:$REA_PLAYSPACE_ADMIN_WS_PORT'
scripts.webhapp-pack: pnpm run web-zip && hc web-app pack workdir/
scripts.web-zip: pnpm run web-build && cd ui/dist && zip -r ../ui.zip .

author: Shane O'Donnell <shane.odonnell@steeltoad.io>, Jillian Ada Burrows <jill@adaburrows.com>, Connor Turland <connor@sprillow.com>
